snippet: The craft, launched last month and meant to demonstrate the possibilities of using sunlight for propulsion, has run into trouble before.
abstract: Scientists associated with Planetary Society, nonprofit space exploration advocacy group led by Bill Nye the Science Guy, say they have lost contact with experimental solar-powered spacecraft LightSail, which has encountered multiple problems since its first launch in May 2015.
lead_paragraph: The craft, launched last month and meant to demonstrate the possibilities of using sunlight for propulsion, has run into trouble before.

headline.main: LightSail, a Private Spacecraft, Goes Unexpectedly Quiet
headline.print_headline: U.S. Scientists Seek Cause of a Spacecraft’s Silence
